Text: I downloaded this file because it was 700MB, and I don't need fancy quality. Not impressed to find the Dutch subs hardcoded. It was really hard to hear the voices in the opening scenes - I think I need English subs for them! A:7 V:3

So the NL subs in the name didnt give you adequate warning that there were Dutch subs? And I guess the fact that it was uploaded by someone or something called Dutch Release Team wasnt helpful either?
